fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We said that the French rugby player Matthieu Jalibert would be the first teenager to start a championship match at fly-half since Billy McCombe in 1968 for Ireland. That missed Neil Jenkins, who was 19 when he started for Wales in 1991 (Jaunty Jalibert ends 50-year wait for a teenage fly-half, 3 February, page 5, Sport). • An article referred to Leslie Feist as a US singer-songwriter. Feist is Canadian (Wok’n’roll!, 5 February, page 4, G2).
